com.nutiteq.utils

Class BitmapUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.utils.BitmapUtils

  • public class BitmapUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for loading bitmaps and converting Bitmaps to Android Bitmaps an vice versa.

      • loadBitmapFromAssets

        public static Bitmap loadBitmapFromAssets(java.lang.String assetPath)
        Loads the specified bitmap asset bundled with the application.
        Parameters:
        assetPath - The asset path to the image to be loaded.

      • loadBitmapFromAssets

        public static Bitmap loadBitmapFromAssets(java.lang.String assetPath,
                                          boolean pow2Padding)
        Loads the specified bitmap asset bundled with the application. If the power of two conversion flag is set,
        additional padding will be added to the image to make it's dimensions power of two.
        Parameters:
        assetPath - The asset path to the image to be loaded.
        pow2Padding - The power of two conversion flag.

      • loadBitmapFromFile

        public static Bitmap loadBitmapFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Loads bitmap from specified file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the image to be loaded.

      • loadBitmapFromFile

        public static Bitmap loadBitmapFromFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                        boolean pow2Padding)
        Loads bitmap from specified file. If the power of two conversion flag is set,
        additional padding will be added to the image to make it's dimensions power of two.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the image to be loaded.
        pow2Padding - The power of two conversion flag.

      • createBitmapFromAndroidBitmap

        public static Bitmap createBitmapFromAndroidBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap androidBitmap)
        Creates a new Bitmap object from an existing Android Bitmap.

      • createBitmapFromAndroidBitmap

        public static Bitmap createBitmapFromAndroidBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap androidBitmap,
                                                   boolean pow2Padding)
        Creates a new Bitmap object from an existing Android Bitmap. If the power of two conversion flag is set,
        additional padding will be added to the image to make it's dimensions power of two.

        Parameters:
        pow2Padding - The power of two conversion flag.

      • createAndroidBitmapFromBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap createAndroidBitmapFromBitmap(Bitmap bitmap)
        Creates a new Android Bitmap from an existing Bitmap.
        Returns:
        The android Bitmap.
